name: Connecty
description:
Simple logic puzzle game in which you should change black colored "buttons" into orange colored in a sequence that is set by the player.

Paid version contains all sound effects, music and game (index.html)*

*In order to launch a game you should change parameter in:

-firefox: url => about:config; change "privacy.file_unique_origin" to "false"

-google chrome: add to link "--allow-file-access-from-file"

=> "C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe" --allow-file-access-from-files
